msbt.message: We got a new friend living here now! Well, they're going to be our friend once we tell them they're our friend!Oh man! Stuff's getting real lively in friendly, old !
Hey, ! Have ya met the new neighbor yet?I'm gonna grab my best snacks and swing on by to say, "Heya! Welcome! Wanna taste this?"I heard once that it's the nicest way to say hello!
Somebody new moved here today! I went to go see 'em, but they were "cleaning house."Anyhoo, I gotta give it a shot some time. I love trying new food and stuff from other cultures, .
Have you talked to the new person who moved here today?I'm gonna talk with them looots! I'm gonna talk to 'em till they're sick of me, and we'll be bestest friends!Off I go, !

Tomorrow's 's birthday!<10_4 /> I hope likes my present.I got it for a while back, then hid it in the floor for the bugs to guard. I got it out, and it was full of bugs!But it's OK.I talked to the bugs about "respect" and "boundaries" and all the other words I hear when I get in trouble!
Tomorrow's 's birthday! <10_4 />Did you get a gift?I thought real hard on it, but I could only think of stuff I want!<10_4 /> I hope likes .

Tomorrow's 's birthday! And tomorrow starts at midnight tonight!So I'm gonna go to place after midnight and start yelling "HAPPY BIRTHDAY!" outside window.Don't let nobody lie to ya. Folks love late night surprises.
It's 's last day here. That makes me sad, man.Ya knowmaybe that's gonna be my superhero name now. "Sad-Man."

Today's 's last day on the island.Do you know manners? What's the right way to say "goodbye"? Or "I'll miss you"? Or"Where'd ya keep your snacks? Are there any crumbs there? And can ya please give me a minute alone?"

This is it. Today's the final day 's moving away tomorrow.It's a shame when a friend leaves too soon. But then somebody new usually shows up, and that's neat.Like Grandma says When one chapter ends, another begins. Unless it's the end of the book.Then ya gotta read a new book so the chapter thing makes sense again.<10_4 /> Yep. That's what she says.
